title: My client doesn't update to 7.1
body: As soon as i saw that 7.1 was out i rushed into a game to try the new kalista... however i think i played in the 6.24  patch because her abilities hadn't changed. How can i fix this?

replies.body:
Are you still experiencing this issue? You can check your Client version from the login screen in the bottom-right corner. Example: **V 7.1-841981891891**

Let me know!
